product.title: Dwellis Rotating Curling Iron & Straightener | 2-in-1 Automatic Curling Wand for Beach Waves & Curls | 30s Fast Heat-up | 12.36" Long Barrel for Long Hair | Ceramic Coating | 356°F-392°F Adjustable Temp
product.title_excluding_brand: Rotating Curling Iron & Straightener | 2-in-1 Automatic Curling Wand for Beach Waves & Curls | 30s Fast Heat-up | 12.36" Long Barrel for Long Hair | Ceramic Coating | 356°F-392°F Adjustable Temp
product.description:
Rotating Curling Iron & Straightener | 2-in-1 Automatic Curling Wand for Beach Waves & Curls | 30s Fast Heat-up | 12.36" Long Barrel for Long Hair | Ceramic Coating | 356°F-392°F Adjustable Temp
Feature:
Quantity: 1Pcs
Colour:Black
Material:Ceramic Product size:31.4x6.8cm/12.36x2.67in
Package size:35.7x7.5x5cm/14.05x2.95x1.96in
Net weight:392/0.86lb
Gross weight:460g/1.01lb
Power supply: US plug
Descrition: FAST STYLING: With its rotating action, the automatic curling iron reduces styling by 50%. You can achieve gorgeous look in just few minutes. Simply take strand of hair, clamp it and let the curling wand do its magical power.
STRAIGHTENING AND CURLING HAIR IN 1: Our rotating curling iron has two functions of curling and straightening hair, you can choose according to your mood and dress.
EFFORTLESS BEACH WAVES: Get beautiful curls and in minutes with the rotating curling iron, you can effortlessly create with one hand.
PERFECTRESULTS: The features proprietary ceramic coating that is 2X smoother than traditional ceramic, creating gorgeous and providing 24-hour staying power.
Hair Health: Particular Profession technology ensures fast and even heating to take precautions hair damage. also keep your hair well-beingand moisturized, withincredible smoothness.
HEATING: adjustable heating settings from 356℉ to 392℉suit all hair types. Additionally, the curling iron automatically turns off when 60 mins of inactivity.
Package Content:
1x Rotating Curling Iron
